meanings.definition: A decorative technique in which enamel is applied to a metal surface with recessed areas.
meanings.sent1: The artist used champleve to create intricate patterns on the jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The champleve design on the vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent3: The champleve work on the shield made it look like a piece of art rather than just armor.
meanings.sent4: Her necklace gleamed like champleve under the bright lights of the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The champleve technique made the metal surface come alive with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The process of creating designs by carving grooves into a metal surface and filling them with enamel.
meanings.sent1: The artisan demonstrated great skill in the champleve process.
meanings.sent2: Champleve requires precision and patience to achieve beautiful results.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled as they attempted the champleve technique in art class.
meanings.sent4: The champleve work on the clock face made time seem more colorful and interesting.
meanings.sent5: The intricate champleve patterns on the brooch caught everyone's eye at the event.
